name: ai-family-album-backend
description: Backend for AI Family Photo Album application

scripts.migrate: node -e "const pool = require('./config/database'); const fs = require('fs'); const sql = fs.readFileSync('./migrations/001_initial_schema.sql', 'utf8'); pool.query(sql).then(() => { console.log('Migration completed successfully'); process.exit(0); }).catch(err => { console.error('Migration failed:', err); process.exit(1); });"

author: AI Family Album Team
